mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event (event_no, event_title, event_content, event_image, event_end_date, event_start_date) values (seq_event_eventno.nextval, #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{event_end_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{event_start_date, jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update tbl_event set event_title = #{event_title}, event_content = #{event_content}, event_image = #{event_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event_end_date = #{event_end_date, jdbcType=DATE}, event_start_date = #{event_start_date, jdbcType=DATE} where event_no = #{event_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_event where event_start_date <= sysdate and event_end_date >= sysdate ) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
